title: Judge to ICE: No Warrantless Arrests in DC Without Proof
description: A federal judge has halted the Trump administration's practice of making immigration arrests in Washington, DC, without a warrant or clear proof that a person is likely to flee. The preliminary injunction, issued by US District Judge Beryl Howell, was granted…
content: Howell's order states that immigration agents must now document and justify, in detail, any decision to arrest someone without a warrant in the nation's capital. This documentation must also be share… [+1016 chars]
